mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_record ( uuid, business_id, operate_time, operator, operate_detail, remark, is_enable ) VALUES ( #{uuid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, SYSDATE(), #{operator,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{operateDetail,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '1' )
mapper.select: select tr.uuid, date_format(tr.operate_time, '%Y-%m-%d') sdate, date_format(tr.operate_time, '%T') stime, tr.operator, su.nickname, tr.operate_detail, tr.remark from t_record tr left join s_users su on su.username = tr.operator where business_id = #{businessId} and is_enable = '1' order by operate_time desc
